name: Office Events Planner
description: Ideal for those who are looking to manage their office events under one glance. This tracker helps you keep track of guest lists, all events scheduled, total expenses and much more.Are you looking for a tracker to keep track of office events?This tracker is perfect to add guests list, set events, add expenses for events and much more all under one glance.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PD
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Set upcomprehensive managementof office events, including adding guest lists, setting events details and budgeting of expenses and much more.; GetCalendaroverview of all events plannedright from adding the event details, setting the guests list and expense budgeting as well.; Get a complete detailed overview of all events added, participants list and other metrics.
